amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding of the Bureau of Reclamation Policy and Administration account by $1,236,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds of the Bureau of Reclamation under the Policy and Administration section by $1,236,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 274 (Roll no. 508).
